root.name: Akira Psycho Ball
root.description: OverviewAkira Psycho Ball is a pinball game based on the world famous Japanese comics and animated movie Akira. The game was released in February 2002 in Japan alongside a commemorative remastered DVD edition of the film, and translated and published by Infogrames in Europe the following year. There are only four tables in the whole game, but there are some clips from the film itself that appear depending how successful the user is.
